vulkanmod.options.advCulling.tooltip: Use a culling algorithm that might improve performance by reducing the number of non visible chunk sections rendered.
vulkanmod.options.ao.subBlock.tooltip: ON (Sub-block): Enables smooth lighting for non full block (experimental).
vulkanmod.options.entityCulling.tooltip: Enables culling for entities on not visible sections.
vulkanmod.options.frameQueue.tooltip: Higher values might help stabilize frametime but will increase input lag.
vulkanmod.options.indirectDraw.tooltip: Reduces CPU overhead but increases GPU overhead. Enabling it might help in CPU limited systems.
vulkanmod.options.uniqueOpaqueLayer.tool: Use a unique render layer for opaque terrain to improve performance. It changes some distant blocks aspect
vulkanmod.options.fixPostEffectBug.toolt: Fixes few bugs with Post-Effect especially when using ASR but Post-effect still renders weird if ASR is enabled. Restarting the game is required to take effect!
vulkanmod.options.animations.tooltip: Makes the animated textures to animate. Disabling this prevents them from animating and may improve performance a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderSky.tooltip: Renders the sky. Disabling this may improve performance a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderFog.tooltip: Renders the fog. Disabling this may improve performance a bit.
vulkanmod.options.renderEntityOutline.to: Renders White Entity Outline on entity when affected by glowing effect. Disabling this may improve performance a lot and also fixes half screen rendering with ASR.
vulkanmod.options.perRenderTypeAreaBuffe:
(WARNING: EXPERIMENTAL)

Potentially improves performance of Chunk Rendering.

Very Architecture specific: May have no effect on some Devices
vulkanmod.options.excludeSampledUsage.to: When enabled, this option optimizes the image solely for rendering operations, enhancing efficiency, and avoiding potential compression issues, particularly on mobile platforms. However, it restricts the image to being solely a render target, thus prohibiting direct sampling in shaders.
vulkanmod.options.swapchainImages.toolti: Sets the number of Swapchain images. Optimised automatically for best performance. This can be reduced to minimise input lag but at the cost of decreased FPS.
vulkanmod.options.showPhoneRAMInfo.toolt: Shows your Phone RAM Info on debug screen.
vulkanmod.options.phoneRAMInfoUpdateDela: Sets the number of seconds when the RAM info updates information. Setting too low can affect performance.
vulkanmod.options.showPojavInfo.tooltip: Shows Pojav Info on debug screen.
vulkanmod.options.showLowRAM.tooltip: Shows Warning when your RAM is low
vulkanmod.options.excludeSampledUsage.wa: WARNING: Requires Game To Restart To Take Effect and will cause bugs and crashes when spectating an entity with Post-effect (ex. Creeper).
vulkanmod.options.resetHighUsageRec.tool: Enable to reset highest memory and RAM usage records every 45 seconds
